episodes.title: 5 Real Cult Rituals You Were Never Meant to See
episodes.description:
Some cults hid behind faith. Others behind fear.

The rituals you’re about to hear? Real. Disturbing. Buried for years.

These aren’t stories — they’re true cases of cult rituals from around the world.
Children sacrificed. Entire families lost.
All of it happened. And most people never heard about it.

In this documentary, we expose 5 real cults that were caught, investigated — or still exist in silence today:

🔸 Altamira child murders (Brazil)
🔸 Order of the Solar Temple (Canada, France, Switzerland)
🔸 Shakahola starvation cult (Kenya, 2023)
🔸 Abboy initiation cult (Nigeria)
🔸 [Insert 5th cult name here if applicable]

If you’re into disturbing true crime, real cult cases, or horrifying ritual killings — this is for you.

🕯️ Watch with the lights off. Comment your thoughts below.

📌 For documentary, educational, and artistic purposes only.

#realcults #cultdocumentary #ritualkillings #altamiracult #shakahola #truecrime
